page.title: 14Services in Llanhari
page.content: Education is provided in two schools Llanhari primary school (3+ to 11+) which has a nursery, and the Welsh Language comprehensive school-Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari.English language secondary schooling is followed at Y Pant comprehensive school at Pontyclun.Library facilities are to be developed at Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari. The village has a clinic which is used by a local group of doctors, health visitors, and a speech therapist. Shopping can be done in the small shopping centre,Ty Isaf,and at a small supermarket and general store.There is also a post office which doubles as a clothing shop.Most people however shop at the newly developed Hypermarket at Talbot Green,the market at Pontyclun or go into the major shopping areas of Cardiff,Bridgend and Pontypridd.
